TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITableItemProvider implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider

Docs.summary: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> with the distinction that any control implementing <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> must expose the relationship between the individual cell and its row and column information.
Access to individual cell functionality is provided by the concurrent implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider>.
Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern> control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetColumnHeaderItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers representing all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
Docs.returns: A collection of UI Automation providers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetRowHeaderItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers representing all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
Docs.returns: A collection of UI Automation providers.
